plays.text: Penalty to Chris McAlpine 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Garry Valk
Goal scored by Robert Reichel assisted by Gary Roberts
Penalty to Mikael Renberg 2 minutes for Slashing Tony Amonte
Penalty to Aki Berg 2 minutes for Hooking Tony Amonte

Goal scored by Steve Sullivan assisted by Eric Daze and Phil Housley

Penalty to Bob Probert 10 minutes for Game Misconduct Gary Roberts
Penalty to Bob Probert 5 minutes for Elbowing Gary Roberts served by Kyle Calder
Goal scored by Darcy Tucker assisted by Alexander Mogilny and Shayne Corson
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for High Sticking(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Mats Sundin assisted by Dmitry Yushkevich and Jonas Hoglund
Penalty to Ryan VandenBussche 2 minutes for Roughing Shayne Corson
Penalty to Shayne Corson 2 minutes for Roughing Ryan VandenBussche
